channel.title: Compile help please
channel.description:
When I try to compile I get this; [code]'JAVAC' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .[/code] How do i fix this?
PS: Server base is Emulous would that be the problem?

item.title: Compile help please
item.dc:creator: @Sno0K Sno0K
item.description:
@Sno0K wrote:

that’s not it… The path is in wrong place, search up where ur java developer kit and install it, then go to C:\Program\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin or C:\program files\etc… Maybe D:\ where u wanna install it, then click the compile.bat file, right click, then “edit”, “modify”, or something that. The one under OPEN. Then there will be a code like this… Probobly…

@echo off *probobly colour here, like "colour 09" without the ""* title EmulousCompiler or something *probobly some echo* "C:\Program\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause cls

That “C:\Program\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin\javac.exe” *.java Inside the " " there should u put the path where the javac.exe should be, just delete everything except \javac.exe and put the real path there.

~Snô0K

Read full topic
